column1: #text=When riding a public bus , I usually feel anxious so I try not to do it too often .
#text=I wait at the bus stop until the bus I am looking to board arrives .
#text=I usually walk to the bus stop .
#text=When the bus arrives , i pay the fare and it .
#text=I usually hope that the bus will not be too full , since I do not like to sit with strangers .
#text=Hopefully I can sit somewhere by myself .
#text=I sit down and usually put on some headphones so that no one tried to have a conversation with my .
#text=Hopefully I was able to secure a window seat so I stare out the window while I wait to get to my destination .
#text=I use a lot of hand sanitizer since buses skeeve me out .
#text=If i 'm going to be on the bus for a long time , I will use a antibacterial wipe to clean around me .
#text=When we get to my destination I will be very relieve and leave .
